titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1936 POIRSON
Mlle Christiane Poirson Maison Blanche Bourville.
18 Place Mallesberbes Paris 17.
1v. 3m. (new), 65 -Oct 9th Dep. 30
July 9. Weather in the Streets 15 15. Sparkenbroke. August 1 Aug 1 p. 1 60 Moll Flanders Aug. 24 p. 2.40 Those Barren Leaves Aug 24 Aug 28 Tom Jones. vols 1 + 2. Oct. 5 p. 3.80 Grass Roof. renewed Oct 5. Oct. 28. Renewed. Dec 23 - Jan 23. 1939 25v. Dec 23 Gone with the Wind (may keep Jan 8 a fortnight) Jan 8 Inside Europe Feb 2. 1939 April 3rd - July 3rd 1939 3 m 1 v A 65v 1939 will renew subsc April 3 Oscar Wilde, F. Harris Apr 26 3 Oscar Wilde Discovers America Apr 26 26 Little Minister Apr 28 28 Cardinal's Snuff Box Nar. Velvet June 13 June 13 Eyeless in Gaza. Elizabeth then. G. Gardens july 17 William Locke: Morals of Marcus subsc due july 3 Aunt Bridge Ordeyne (sent p.c. July 4) White Sister. M. Crawford Renewed july 3 - to October 3. 3m. 1 vol. A 100 Mrs. Humphrey Ward
POIRSON July 18 / Portrait of the Artist Oct 3 / Mortal Storm Oct 3 / It Had to Happen Oct 3 / Elizabeth & Essex Oct 3 / Plagued by the Nightingale Oct 3 / Sun also Rises Oct 3 / Princess Casamassima Oct 3
